title: Build a Task Table
description: Create a Drift table for tasks with proper column types.
instructions: Define a Tasks table with: id (auto-increment), title (required, max 100 chars), description (optional), isCompleted (default false), dueDate (optional), priority (default 0), createdAt (default now).
hints: Use integer().autoIncrement()() for the id column
Use text().nullable()() for optional text fields
Use withDefault(const Constant(value)) for default values
